Description: In 2015, the Liberals swept all 32 seats in Atlantic Canada and won a majority In 2019, they lost Now they want it back
Title: How Justin Trudeau s Liberals plan to take back Atlantic Canada
Author: Stephanie Levitz Ottawa Bureau

Description: The former University of King's College and Dalhousie University professor is now facing three counts of sexual assault and two counts of indecent assault
Title: New counts of sexual assault, indecent assault laid against Wayne Hankey
Author: CBC News

Description: A recent study by Dalhousie University's head of wheelchair research says occupational therapists in the province aren't feeling prepared when it comes to offering training for wheelchair skills
Title: Advocates say more wheelchair training needed for N S occupational therapists
Author: CBC News

Description: Using a diverse set of tools, researchers show how the pandemic did or didn't affect fine particulate matter concentrations during COVID lockdowns
Title: Pandemic air quality due to weather, not just lockdowns, study finds
Author: No Data Available

Description: Les temps ont chang dans le monde merveilleux de l'Internet des objets (IoT) Ce qui tait autrefois une id e nouvelle et fascinante a rapidement fait son chemin dans le c ur et l'esprit des consommateurs du monde entier Qu'il s'agisse de wearables comme le
Title: Aller plus haut, se rapprocher de l'avenir et voler vos donn es IoT
Author: Cheryl Ajluni
